PageDefinitionSpec.Name: Constituent Page
PageDefinitionSpec.Description: This page displays information about a constituent.
PageDefinitionSpec.Author: Blackbaud Product Development

ResourceString.Name: message
ResourceString.Value: The address has been geocoded successfully.

Action.Caption: Mark deceased
Action.Visible: =(Not Fields!DECEASED) AndAlso (Not Fields!ISORG) AndAlso (Not Page.Fields!ISGROUP) AndAlso (Page.Fields!DECEASINGOPTIONSSET AndAlso Globals.CurrentAppUserGrantedPage("6CF1EBA9-7002-4C85-A787-759550F19987"))

Action.Caption: Mark deceased
Action.Visible: =(Not Fields!DECEASED) AndAlso (Not Fields!ISORG) AndAlso (Not Page.Fields!ISGROUP) AndAlso ((Not Page.Fields!DECEASINGOPTIONSSET) OrElse (Not Globals.CurrentAppUserGrantedPage("6CF1EBA9-7002-4C85-A787-759550F19987")))

Action.Caption: Undo mark deceased
Action.Visible: =( Fields!DECEASED AndAlso Not Fields!ISORG) AndAlso Not Page.Fields!ISGROUP

Action.Caption: Add individual
Action.Visible: =(Not Page.Fields!ISORG) AndAlso (Not Page.Fields!ISGROUP) AndAlso Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_IND_TO_IND_REL_ADD_FOR_CONSTIT AndAlso Page.Fields!MARRIAGERULESSET

Action.Caption: Add individual
Action.Visible: =(Not Page.Fields!ISORG) AndAlso (Not Page.Fields!ISGROUP) AndAlso Not Page.Fields!MARRIAGERULESSET

Action.Caption: Edit
Action.Visible: =(Not Page.Fields!ISORG) AndAlso (Not Page.Fields!ISGROUP) AndAlso (Fields!RECIPROCALCONSTITUENTTYPE = 0) AndAlso Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_IND_TO_IND_REL_ADD_FOR_CONSTIT AndAlso Page.Fields!MARRIAGERULESSET

Action.Caption: Edit
Action.Visible: =(Not Page.Fields!ISORG) AndAlso (Not Page.Fields!ISGROUP) AndAlso (Fields!RECIPROCALCONSTITUENTTYPE = 0) AndAlso Not Page.Fields!MARRIAGERULESSET

Tab.Caption: Revenue Summary
Tab.Visible: =Not Globals.isWebshell AndAlso Page.Fields!ISCONSTITUENT AndAlso Not Page.Fields!ISFAFREGISTRANT

Tab.Caption: Recognition Summary
Tab.Visible: =Not Globals.isWebshell AndAlso Page.Fields!ISCONSTITUENT AndAlso Not Page.Fields!ISFAFREGISTRANT

Tab.Caption: Declarations
Tab.Visible: =(Products.ProductIsInstalled(InstalledProducts.UK) and (NOT Page.Fields!ISGROUP) and (NOT Page.Fields!ISORG) AndAlso Page.Fields!ISCONSTITUENT AndAlso Not Page.Fields!ISFAFREGISTRANT)

Tab.Caption: Gift Aid Refunds
Tab.Visible: =(Products.ProductIsInstalled(InstalledProducts.UK) and (NOT Page.Fields!ISGROUP) and (NOT Page.Fields!ISORG) AndAlso Page.Fields!ISCONSTITUENT AndAlso Not Page.Fields!ISFAFREGISTRANT)

AllowsMultiSelect.Prompt: Are you sure you want to delete these bank accounts from the bank?

Section.Caption: Summary
Section.Visible: =Page.Fields!CANSOLICITREVENUE OrElse Page.Fields!HASFUNDRAISINGGOALS OrElse Page.Fields!CANCOORDINATEEVENTS OrElse Page.Fields!HASEVENTS OrElse (Products.ProductIsInstalled(InstalledProducts.Enterprise) AndAlso Page.Fields!HASCAMPAIGNS)

Action.Caption: File a contact report
Action.Enabled: =not CBool(Fields!ISSTEWARDSHIPSTEP) AndAlso CBool(Fields!ISINTERACTION) AndAlso Not CBool(Fields!ISFUNDINGREQUESTSTEP)

Action.Caption: Step
Action.Visible: =not CBool(Fields!ISSTEWARDSHIPSTEP) AndAlso Not CBool(Fields!ISFUNDINGREQUESTSTEP) AndAlso Not CBool(Fields!ISGENERALINTERACTION)

Action.Caption: Prospect plan
Action.Visible: =not CBool(Fields!ISSTEWARDSHIPSTEP) AndAlso Not CBool(Fields!ISFUNDINGREQUESTSTEP) AndAlso Not CBool(Fields!ISGENERALINTERACTION)

Action.Caption: Open file
Action.AppendSeparator: =Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITNOTENOTIFICATION_ADD or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITNOTENOTIFICATION_EDIT or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITNOTE_ADD or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITMEDIALINK_ADD or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITATTACHMENT_ADD or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITNOTE_EDIT_2 or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITMEDIALINK_EDIT or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITNOTENOTIFICATION_DELETE or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITATTACHMENT_EDIT or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITNOTENOTIFICATION_DELETE or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITNOTE_DELETE or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITMEDIALINK_DELETE or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITATTACHMENT_DELETE

Action.Caption: Open file
Action.AppendSeparator: =Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITNOTENOTIFICATION_ADD or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITNOTENOTIFICATION_EDIT or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITNOTE_ADD or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITMEDIALINK_ADD or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITATTACHMENT_ADD or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITNOTE_EDIT_2 or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITMEDIALINK_EDIT or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITNOTENOTIFICATION_DELETE or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITATTACHMENT_EDIT or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITNOTENOTIFICATION_DELETE or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITNOTE_DELETE or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITMEDIALINK_DELETE or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITATTACHMENT_DELETE

Action.Caption: Open file
Action.AppendSeparator: =Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITNOTENOTIFICATION_ADD or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITNOTENOTIFICATION_EDIT or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITNOTE_ADD or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITMEDIALINK_ADD or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITATTACHMENT_ADD or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITNOTE_EDIT_2 or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITMEDIALINK_EDIT or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITNOTENOTIFICATION_DELETE or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITATTACHMENT_EDIT or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITNOTENOTIFICATION_DELETE or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITNOTE_DELETE or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITMEDIALINK_DELETE or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITATTACHMENT_DELETE

Action.Caption: Open file
Action.AppendSeparator: =Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITNOTENOTIFICATION_ADD or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITNOTENOTIFICATION_EDIT or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITNOTE_ADD or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITMEDIALINK_ADD or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITATTACHMENT_ADD or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITNOTE_EDIT_2 or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITMEDIALINK_EDIT or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITNOTENOTIFICATION_DELETE or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITATTACHMENT_EDIT or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITNOTENOTIFICATION_DELETE or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITNOTE_DELETE or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITMEDIALINK_DELETE or Page.Fields!USER_GRANTED_CONSTITATTACHMENT_DELETE

Action.Caption: Go to mailing
Action.Visible: = RowSelected() AndAlso Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE = "6" AndAlso Products.ProductIsInstalled(InstalledProducts.BasicDevelopment) AndAlso Not Products.ProductIsInstalled(InstalledProducts.Enterprise)
Action.Enabled: = RowSelected() AndAlso Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE = "6" AndAlso Products.ProductIsInstalled(InstalledProducts.BasicDevelopment) AndAlso Not Products.ProductIsInstalled(InstalledProducts.Enterprise)

Action.Caption: Edit correspondence
Action.Visible: = ((Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE <> "6" AndAlso Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE <> "8" AndAlso Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE <> "9") OrElse Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE Is Nothing) AndAlso String.IsNullOrEmpty(Fields!RecordID)

Action.Caption: Edit correspondence
Action.Visible: = ((Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE <> "6" AndAlso Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE <> "8" AndAlso Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE <> "9") OrElse Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE Is Nothing) AndAlso Not String.IsNullOrEmpty(Fields!RecordID)

Action.Caption: Edit correspondence
Action.Visible: = (Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE = "6" OrElse Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE = "8" OrElse Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE = "9") OrElse (Not Globals.CurrentAppUserGrantedForm("003A34FC-C78F-412D-8EBA-38782ED38E9F") AndAlso Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE <> "0")
Action.Enabled: = RowSelected() AndAlso (Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE = "6" OrElse Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE = "8" OrElse Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE = "9") AndAlso Fields!FINDERNUMBER = "0"

Action.Caption: Edit responses
Action.Visible: = RowSelected() AndAlso (Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE = "6" OrElse Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE = "8" OrElse Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE = "9")
Action.Enabled: = RowSelected() AndAlso (Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE = "6" OrElse Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE = "8" OrElse Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE = "9")

Action.Caption: Delete
Action.Visible: = (Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE <> "6" AndAlso Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE <> "8" AndAlso Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE <> "9") OrElse Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE Is Nothing

Action.Caption: Delete
Action.Visible: = (Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE = "6" OrElse Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE = "8" OrElse Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE = "9") OrElse (Not Globals.CurrentAppUserGrantedRecordOperation("D1DCE760-7C7E-4939-AB21-C39061AE62E0") AndAlso Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE <> "0")
Action.Enabled: = RowSelected() AndAlso (Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE = "6" OrElse Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE = "8" OrElse Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE = "9")

Action.Caption: Go to mailing
Action.Visible: = RowSelected() AndAlso Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE = "6" AndAlso Products.ProductIsInstalled(InstalledProducts.BasicDevelopment) AndAlso Not Products.ProductIsInstalled(InstalledProducts.Enterprise)
Action.Enabled: = RowSelected() AndAlso Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE = "6" AndAlso Products.ProductIsInstalled(InstalledProducts.BasicDevelopment) AndAlso Not Products.ProductIsInstalled(InstalledProducts.Enterprise)

Action.Caption: Edit correspondence
Action.Visible: = (Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE <> "6" OrElse Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE Is Nothing) AndAlso Not String.IsNullOrEmpty(Fields!RecordID)

Action.Caption: Edit correspondence
Action.Visible: = (Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE <> "6" OrElse Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE Is Nothing) AndAlso String.IsNullOrEmpty(Fields!RecordID)
Action.Enabled: =RowSelected() AndAlso Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE = "0" AndAlso CBool(Fields!HASPERMISSIONS) AndAlso String.IsNullOrEmpty(Fields!RecordID)

Action.Caption: Edit correspondence
Action.Enabled: =RowSelected() AndAlso Fields!CORRESPONDENCETYPECODE = "6" AndAlso Fields!FINDERNUMBER = "0" AndAlso CBool(Fields!HASPERMISSIONS)

Action.Caption: Go to mailing
Action.Visible: =Not CBool(Fields!ISAPPEALMAILING) AndAlso CInt(Fields!MAILINGFAMILYTYPECODE) = 1 AndAlso Products.ProductIsInstalled(InstalledProducts.BasicDevelopment) AndAlso Not Products.ProductIsInstalled(InstalledProducts.Enterprise)
Action.Enabled: =Not CBool(Fields!ISAPPEALMAILING) AndAlso CInt(Fields!MAILINGFAMILYTYPECODE) = 1 AndAlso Products.ProductIsInstalled(InstalledProducts.BasicDevelopment) AndAlso Not Products.ProductIsInstalled(InstalledProducts.Enterprise)

Action.Caption: Edit group
Action.Visible: =Page.Fields!ISGROUP AndAlso Not Page.Fields!ISHOUSEHOLD AndAlso Not Page.Fields!ISCOMMITTEE

Action.Caption: Enroll as student
Action.Visible: =(Products.ProductIsInstalled(InstalledProducts.BasicEducation)) and (Not Fields!ISORG) AndAlso (Not Page.Fields!ISGROUP) AndAlso (Not Page.Fields!ISSTUDENT) AndAlso (Not Page.Fields!ISALUMNUS)

Action.Caption: Mark as faculty
Action.Visible: =(Products.ProductIsInstalled(InstalledProducts.BasicEducation)) and (Not Fields!ISORG) AndAlso (Not Page.Fields!ISGROUP) AndAlso (Not Page.Fields!ISFACULTY)

Action.Caption: Add spouse
Action.Visible: =( (Page.Fields!AGE > 15 OrElse Page.Fields!AGE = 0) AndAlso (Not Page.Fields!HASSPOUSE) AndAlso (Not Page.Fields!ISORG)) AndAlso Not Page.Fields!ISGROUP AndAlso Page.Fields!MARRIAGERULESSET

Action.Caption: Add spouse
Action.Visible: =( (Page.Fields!AGE > 15 OrElse Page.Fields!AGE = 0) AndAlso (Not Page.Fields!HASSPOUSE) AndAlso (Not Page.Fields!ISORG)) AndAlso Not Page.Fields!ISGROUP AndAlso Not Page.Fields!MARRIAGERULESSET
